member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory
member.summary: Abstract base class for bilingual file-based () and in-memory translation memories (). Do not inherit from this class.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemory
member.summary: Represents a translation memory.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider
member.summary: Represents a multi-lingual translation engine. This can for instance be a translation memory or machine translation engine.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsLanguageDirection(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.Core.LanguagePair)
member.summary: Checks whether this translation provider supports the specified language direction.
member.returns: True if the specified language direction is supported.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.GetLanguageDirection(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.Core.LanguagePair)
member.summary: Gets a translation provider for the specified language direction.
member.returns: The language direction matching the given source and target language.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.RefreshStatusInfo
member.summary: Ensures that the provider's status information () is refreshed, in case it is cached.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SerializeState
member.summary: Serializes any meaningful state information for this translation provider that can be stored in projects and sent around the supply chain.
member.remarks: The format of this string can be decided upon by the translation provider implementation.
member.returns: A string representing the state of this translation provider that can later be passed into the method to restore the state after creating a new translation provider.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.LoadState(System.String)
member.summary: Loads previously serialized state information into this translation provider instance.
member.remarks: The format of this string can be decided upon by the translation provider implementation.
member.param: A string representing the state of translation provider that was previously saved using .

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.StatusInfo
member.summary: Gets the status info for the provider.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.Uri
member.summary: Gets a URI which uniquely identifies this translation provider.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.Name
member.summary: Gets the user-friendly name of this provider. It is not necessarily unique across the system.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsTaggedInput
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether or not the translation provider engine supports processing of tagged input and will return input tags in the translation proposals. If false, the engine may drop all tags from search segments, and may not return tags in the output.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsScoring
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider produces scored results in the rank between [minScore, 100]. If false, no scores will be computed.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsSearchForTranslationUnits
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports searching for bilingual input TUs (i.e. the SearchTranslationUnit method group). If false, the service only supports searching for simple (monolingual) segments.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsMultipleResults
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the engine may return multiple results for a search. If false, at most one result (and translation proposal) will be computed.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsFilters
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports filters for text and attribute fields. If false, filters supplied in the search settings will be ignored.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsPenalties
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports penalties of various types. If false, all penalties supplied in the search settings will be ignored.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsStructureContext
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports a structure context specification and will consider it for searches. If false, the structure context will be ignored.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsDocumentSearches
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports document searches and will take document (textual) context into account.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsUpdate
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports updating/adding of translation units. If false, all update/add methods will return without effect. Note that implementations should not throw exceptions for unsupported methods.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsPlaceables
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports the detection and handling of placeables, and will return them as part of the search result.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsTranslation
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports translation search (exact and/or fuzzy search) and the generation of translation proposals. In most cases this flag will be true. If this value is false, the translation provider can not be used to request translations, but can still be used to search for concordance matches, if is true.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsFuzzySearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports fuzzy search. This value should be false if is false.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsConcordanceSearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports concordance search in the source or the target language. For more detailed information, see and .

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsSourceConcordanceSearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports concordance search in the source language.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsTargetConcordanceSearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports concordance search in the target language.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsWordCounts
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider will compute and return word counts in searches.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.TranslationMethod
member.summary: Gets the primary method how the translation provider generates translations.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider or its underlying storage are read-only. If this flag is true, no data can be deleted, updated, or added.

member.returns: A translation provider for the specified language direction, or null if no language direction matches.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderLanguageDirection.AddOrUpdateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Int32[],Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.ImportSettings)
member.summary:
Adds an array of translation units to the database. If hash codes of the previous translations are provided, a found translation will be overwritten. If none is found, or the hash is 0 or the collection is null, the operation behaves identical to .
If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
If provided, a corresponding array of a the hash code of a previous translation.
The settings used for this operation.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderLanguageDirection.AddTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.ImportSettings,System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Adds an array of translation units to the database, but will only add those for which the corresponding mask field is true. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
The settings used for this operation.
A boolean array with the same cardinality as the TU array, specifying which TUs to add.
member.returns: An array of ImportResult objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderLanguageDirection.AddOrUpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Int32[],Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.ImportSettings,System.Boolean[])
member.summary:
Adds an array of translation units to the database, but will only add those for which the corresponding mask field is true. If the previous translation hashes are provided, existing translations will be updated if the target segment hash changed.
If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
Corresponding hash codes of a previous translation (0 if unknown). The parameter may be null.
The settings used for this operation.
A boolean array with the same cardinality as the TU array, specifying which TUs to add.
member.returns: An array of ImportResult objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit)
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an existing translation unit if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds a new translation unit otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation unit should be initialized in a previous call to the translation memory, so that the ID property is set to a valid value.
member.param: The translation unit to be updated.
member.returns: The result of the operation.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[])
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an array of existing translation units if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds new translation units otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation units should be initialized in previous calls to the translation memory, so that their ID properties are set to valid values.
member.param: The translation unit array to be updated.
member.returns: An array of results which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.summary:
Obtains the translation for a single segment from the machine translation service and returns it in the field of a . Obtaining the translation may be through a round-trip to the server.
This method is abstract and must be implemented by derived classes.
To create a search result from a segment, you can use .
member.param: The segment to translate (must not be null)
member.returns: A data structure if the translation was successful, and null otherwise.

member.summary:
Obtains the translation for a set of segments from the machine translation service and returns it in the field of a collection. Obtaining the translation should, but does not have to, result in only a single server round-trip.
This method is abstract and must be implemented by derived classes.
To create a search result from a segment, you can use .
member.param: The segments to translate (must not be null)
member.returns: A collection of data structures if the translation was successful, and null otherwise.

member.summary: A cascade is used to perform searches and updates across many different translation provider language directions. Each translation provider language direction is represented by a cascade entry that contains other information with regards to how it should be treated - e.g. what penalties should be applied during searches.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Cascade`1.CheckTokensAndPlaceables(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.SearchResults,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.SearchResults)
member.summary: Not all translation providers tokenize the source segment and evaluate the document placeables so check that this information is not lost when new results overwrite the current set of results. The most common occurrence is when a cascade contains a translation memory and a machine translation provider. The TM provider returns no matches but tokenizes the source segment. This will be overwritten by the MT result which probably won't tokenise the segment.

member.summary: Represents a scheduled recomputation of the fuzzy index statistics of a server-based translation memory on the Execution Server. This class can be used to schedule a recomputation of the fuzzy index statistics of a server-based translation memory and also to monitor the operation's status while it is running.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ScheduledReindexOperation
member.summary: When changing recognizer settings or when changing variables, abbreviations or ordinal followers, it might be necessary to re-index the Translation Memory in order to make sure these settings are applied to existing Translation Units. This class represents a scheduled re-indexing of a server-based translation memory on the Execution Server. This class can be used to schedule a re-indexing of a server-based translation memory and also to monitor the operation's status while it is running.

member.summary: Constructs a TranslationMemoryUriBuilder class using the given type and protocol.
member.remarks: If the protocol value is set to the special value "file" then this will have an effect on how the property is stored. For "file" protocols the Resource property will always be converted back to a local Windows file format with server path separation characters '/' replaced by local file path separating characters '\'.
member.param: A type string which is used together with the protocol string to uniquely identify a translation provider. You may wish to use your company name or initials as part of this unique identifier. This must not contain the "." character and must not be equal to "file" as this is not compatible with the Translation Provider Uri Schema.
A protocol string used together with the type parameter to uniquely identify a translation provider.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore
member.summary: This interface represents a storage mechanism for translation provider credentials. The host application will provide an implementation of this object, which will be passed on to the and components so they can retrieve and add credentials from and to the store. It is up to the store implementation whether it for instance persists its contents or not.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore.GetCredential(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets a credential for the given URI.
member.param: The URI for which to retrieve the credential. Note that this does not necessarily have to be the translation provider URI itself. It can be a more general URI, for instance identifying the server on which the translation provider lives. This allows for reusing credentials for different translation providers hosted on the same server.
member.returns: A serialized credential; or null if no credential for the given URI is available.

This allows for reusing credentials for different translation providers hosted on the same server.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemory.IsUnlockedWithSufficientPermissions
member.summary: Determines whether the file based translation memory has been unlocked with sufficient permissions to be deemed available. When null, no attempt has been made to unlock the file based translation memory and obtain sufficient permission. When false, an attempt has been made to unlock the file based translation memory and obtain sufficient permission that failed. When true, an attempt has been made to unlock the file based translation memory and obtain sufficient permission that succeeded. If this is false then StatusInfo. Available will be false with a message "Not unlocked with sufficient permissions." This property should be set by the calling code after the user has been challenged.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemory.StatusInfo
member.summary: Gets the status info for the translation memory. A file-based translation memory is considered available if the translation memory file exists and if the translation memory has been unlocked by calling (in case the translation memory) is password protected.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.DeleteTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Deletes all translation units in the TM, using an iterator. The iterator will process only a fixed maximum number of translation units () and then the call will return, giving the client an opportunity to discontinue the process or update the UI before the next round-trip.
Optionally, a filter can be set on the iterator which then will only delete those TUs which satisfy the filter condition.
member.returns: The number of deleted translation units.

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units identified by the identifiers in the collection.
member.param: The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The collection of TU IDs to apply the edit script to.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.EditTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.EditScripts.EditScript,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.EditScripts.EditUpdateMode,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary: Applies an to the translation units, using an iterator.
member.param: The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The iterator to use. Note that a filter condition can be set on the iterator in which case the script will only be applied to those translation units which satisfy the filter condition.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units
member.remarks: Note that a filter condition can also be set on the instead of the iterator. Depending on the back-end storage, it may be more efficient to set it on the iterator than on the edit script.

member.summary: Applies the specified edit script to the translation units in a TM, but unlike , the TUs will not be updated in the TM, but modified copies of the TUs will be returned to the caller. This can be used to "preview" the changes the edit script would apply.
member.param: An iterator. See also the iterator-related remarks for .

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetDuplicateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.DuplicateIterator@)
member.summary:
Returns a set of potentially duplicated translation units in the TM, using a special . A group of TUs are considered potential duplicates of each other if the internal hash values for their source segments are identical. There may be several reasons for this being the case:
The TUs have the same source segment, but different translations
The TUs have different source segments, but only differ in complex tokens (controlled through the TM's ) which will result in the identical hash values,
The source segments only differ by whitespace or certain punctuation, which do not modify the hash values,
The hashing algorithm leads to collisions in which case the segments may be entirely different, but still result in the same hash value.
member.returns: The translation units which are potential duplicates, or null if no more potential duplicates can be found.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.PersistentObjectToken)
member.summary: Retrieves the translation unit with the specified from the translation memory.
member.param: The ID of the translation unit to retrieve.
member.returns: The translation unit with the specified ID, or null if that TU does not exist.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Retrieves a set of translation units, using an iterator. At most translation units will be returned in one round-trip.
A can be set on the iterator in which case only those TUs which satisfy the filter condition will be returned.
See also the remarks on on how to avoid timeouts with filtered iteration.
member.returns: The translation units, or null if no more translation units can be retrieved.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Updates (adds, overwrites, or merges) the specified translation units.
member.param: An optional mask with the same length as . If provided, only those TUs in will be updated for which the corresponding flag in is true. Those TUs for which the corresponding flag is false will only be used to establish context information. If no masking is required, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: An array of s with the same length as , which indicates, for each translation unit, the action taken by the translation memory.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.ReindexTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Re-indexes the translation memory, using an iterator so that the client can update progress indicators or discontinue the process.
The same iterator instance should be passed in subsequent calls, in order to obtain the next page, and so on.
member.param: The iterator to use for the re-indexing process.
member.returns: False if the iterator is at the end of the TM or the TM is empty, true otherwise. The re-indexing process should be continued until the method returns false.
member.remarks: For larger TMs (> 100.000 TUs) it is recommended to also recompute the index statistics after the re-indexing finished (see ).

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit)
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an existing translation unit if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds a new translation unit otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation unit should be initialized in a previous call to the translation memory, so that the ID property is set to a valid value.
member.param: The translation unit to be updated.
member.returns: The result of the operation.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[])
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an array of existing translation units if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds new translation units otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation units should be initialized in previous calls to the translation memory, so that their ID properties are set to valid values.
member.param: The translation unit array to be updated.
member.returns: An array of results which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Updates (adds, overwrites, or merges) the specified translation units.
member.param: An optional mask with the same length as . If provided, only those TUs in will be updated for which the corresponding flag in is true. Those TUs for which the corresponding flag is false will only be used to establish context information. If no masking is required, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: An array of s with the same length as , which indicates, for each translation unit, the action taken by the translation memory.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirectionCollection
member.summary:
Represents the collection of language directions of a server-based translation memory (). Language directions can be added to and removed from this collection. In order to persist these changes you should save the translation memory itself (see ).
Saving a translation memory after adding or removing language directions will result in the corresponding physical bilingual translation memories being added to or deleted from the container which hosts the server-based translation memory.
All the language directions in a given translation memory should have a unique source-target language combination. Multiple source language are supported.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.TranslationMemoryImporter.ImportTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.ImportStatistics)
member.summary:
Imports the specified translation unit into the configured translation memory. Depending on the page size, the translation unit might not be added to the translation memory immediately, but cached into an internal buffer and processed when the page size is reached, there are no more translation units in the input stream or when Flush is called explicitly.
Stats is an input/output parameter and it will be updated after the execution of this method accordingly.
member.param: The translation unit to be imported.

The import statistics, which will be updated during processing. Note that if a filter is set, the sum of the individual import results does not necessarily match the overall statistics since some TUs will never be processed by the TM.
member.returns: Response.Cancel if there is an event listener that has signaled it wants to stop the import, otherwise Response.Continue.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.TranslationMemoryImporter.Flush(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.ImportStatistics)
member.summary: Flushes the content of the internal translation unit buffer into the translation memory immediately.
member.remarks: Stats is an input/output parameter and it will be updated after the execution of this method accordingly.
member.returns: Response.Cancel if there is an event listener that has signaled it wants to stop the import, otherwise Response.Continue.

member.param: True if the language pairs are compatible; false otherwise.
member.returns: false if a match is found, true if a match is found in the reverse direction

The template is potentially shared by a number of translation memories. Changes made to the template will affect all translation memories which refer to this template.
If you want to make field changes for this translation memory only, make those modifications through the property. Before you can do that, set the property to null.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemory.LanguageResourcesTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the object associated with this TM.
member.remarks:
The template is a shared entity that defines the language resources that are associated with one or more TMs. Modifying the template will therefore cause modifications to the shared data and alter the language resources for all associated TMs.
If you want to make language resource changes for this translation memory only, make those modifications through the property. Before you can do that, set the property to null. ///
member.exception: Thrown when this object has been deleted.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.DeleteTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Deletes all translation units in the TM, using an iterator. The iterator will process only a fixed maximum number of translation units () and then the call will return, giving the client an opportunity to discontinue the process or update the UI before the next round-trip.
Optionally, a filter can be set on the iterator which then will only delete those TUs which satisfy the filter condition.
member.returns: The number of deleted translation units.

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units identified by the identifiers in the collection.
member.param: The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The collection of TU IDs to apply the edit script to.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units, using an iterator.
member.param: The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The iterator to use. Note that a filter condition can be set on the iterator in which case the script will only be applied to those translation units which satisfy the filter condition.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units
member.remarks: Note that a filter condition can also be set on the instead of the iterator. Depending on the back-end storage, it may be more efficient to set it on the iterator than on the edit script.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.PreviewEditTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.EditScripts.EditScript,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary: Applies the specified edit script to the translation units in a TM, but unlike , the TUs will not be updated in the TM, but modified copies of the TUs will be returned to the caller. This can be used to "preview" the changes the edit script would apply.
member.param: An iterator. See also the iterator-related remarks for .

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetDuplicateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.DuplicateIterator@)
member.summary:
Returns a set of potentially duplicated translation units in the TM, using a special . A group of TUs are considered potential duplicates of each other if the internal hash values for their source segments are identical. There may be several reasons for this being the case:
The TUs have the same source segment, but different translations
The TUs have different source segments, but only differ in complex tokens (controlled through the TM's ) which will result in the identical hash values,
The source segments only differ by whitespace or certain punctuation, which do not modify the hash values,
The hashing algorithm leads to collisions in which case the segments may be entirely different, but still result in the same hash value.
member.returns: The translation units which are potential duplicates, or null if no more potential duplicates can be found.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.PersistentObjectToken)
member.summary: Retrieves the translation unit with the specified from the translation memory.
member.param: The ID of the translation unit to retrieve.
member.returns: The translation unit with the specified ID, or null if that TU does not exist.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Retrieves a set of translation units, using an iterator. At most translation units will be returned in one round-trip.
A can be set on the iterator in which case only those TUs which satisfy the filter condition will be returned.
See also the remarks on on how to avoid timeouts with filtered iteration.
member.returns: The translation units, or null if no more translation units can be retrieved.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Updates (adds, overwrites, or merges) the specified translation units.
member.param: An optional mask with the same length as . If provided, only those TUs in will be updated for which the corresponding flag in is true. Those TUs for which the corresponding flag is false will only be used to establish context information. If no masking is required, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: An array of s with the same length as , which indicates, for each translation unit, the action taken by the translation memory.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.ReindexTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Re-indexes the translation memory, using an iterator so that the client can update progress indicators or discontinue the process.
The same iterator instance should be passed in subsequent calls, in order to obtain the next page, and so on.
member.param: The iterator to use for the re-indexing process.
member.returns: False if the iterator is at the end of the TM or the TM is empty, true otherwise. The re-indexing process should be continued until the method returns false.
member.remarks: For larger TMs (> 100.000 TUs) it is recommended to also recompute the index statistics after the re-indexing finished (see ).

member.summary:

Updates the properties and fields of an existing translation unit if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds a new translation unit otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation unit should be initialized in a previous call to the translation memory, so that the ID property is set to a valid value.
member.param: The translation unit to be updated.
member.returns: The result of the operation.

If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation units should be initialized in previous calls to the translation memory, so that their ID properties are set to valid values.
member.param: The translation unit array to be updated.
member.returns: An array of results which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.
